Title: Prompting for more than code
Author: Visual Studio Code
Description:
You can write prompts to do more than generate code with GitHub Copilot. Take a stroll on the creative side and let the AI start answering questions about a set of recipes - including planning out an entire dinner party. This isn't just empty calories though - you'll learn how iteratively interacting with the AI in a creative fashion will help you build better prompt driven apps.
